name: mf-react
description: A Sample of Module Federation using React as host

scripts.init: concurrently "cd packages/app; npm install" "cd packages/contact; npm install" "cd packages/dashboard; npm install" "cd packages/home; npm install" "cd packages/store; npm install" "cd packages/storeNano; npm install"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd packages/app; npm run serve" "cd packages/contact; npm run serve" "cd packages/dashboard; npm run serve" "cd packages/home; npm run serve" "cd packages/store; npm run serve" "cd packages/storeNano; npm run serve"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd packages/app; npm run build" "cd packages/contact; npm run build" "cd packages/dashboard; npm run build" "cd packages/home; npm run build" "cd packages/store; npm run build" "cd packages/storeNano; npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd packages/app; npm run dev" "cd packages/contact; npm run dev" "cd packages/dashboard; npm run dev" "cd packages/home; npm run dev" "cd packages/store; npm run dev" "cd packages/storeNano; npm run dev"
